channel.title: Antique Phonograph Music Program with MAC | WFMU
channel.description: The Antique Phonograph Music Program is a collection of pop, standard, and ethnic music acoustically recorded on discs and cylinders and played on period machines circa 1895-1925.
channel.itunes:summary: The Antique Phonograph Music Program is a collection of pop, standard, and ethnic music acoustically recorded on discs and cylinders and played on period machines circa 1895-1925.
channel.itunes:subtitle: WFMU presents pop and standard cylinder music, 1895-1925.
channel.itunes:author: MAC and WFMU

image.title: Antique Phonograph Music Program with MAC | WFMU

channel.itunes:keywords: phonograph, cylinder, disc, 78, Tuesday, ragtime, flapper, vaudeville, tin pan alley, radio, WFMU
